definition: variant of 窪|洼[wa1]/(used in names)

sentences.english: The passenger side of my car has dents and scratches all over it.
sentences.chinese: 車子的右側到處是凹痕和刮痕。

sentences.english: When my father sees the dent in his fender, he'll be mad as hornet.
sentences.chinese: 我父親看到汽車擋泥板上的凹痕時，他一定會發怒的。

sentences.english: A person could feel these dots and dashes on the other side of the paper.
sentences.chinese: 人們可以在紙的另一面感覺到這些圓孔和凹痕。

sentences.english: There is dent and rust of the metal shelf(hob), which need to be re-produced.
sentences.chinese: 這些鐵架有凹痕，有鐵鏽，需要返工處理。

sentences.english: I was rear-ended just now on Highway 280. And it made a little dent in the bumper.
sentences.chinese: 我的車在280號公路被撞了，保險桿有一點凹痕。

sentences.english: Pitted anvil surfaces may be refinished with 600 grit paper .
sentences.chinese: 鐵砧表面的凹痕可能要用600沙礫紙打磨。

sentences.english: Is the time of 50 to 70 milliseconds based on an estimate of the size of the dent?
sentences.chinese: 50到70毫秒這個估算是根據凹痕的大小作出的嗎？

sentences.english: Paper defect where there is a hair-like indentation in a coated surface running in grain direction.
sentences.chinese: 順着紙紋方向，紙面的塗層有着像頭髮絲的凹痕故障。

sentences.english: He hammered out the dents in the metal sheet.
sentences.chinese: 他把金屬板上的一些凹痕敲掉了。

sentences.english: Elisa came through the gate to watch him while he pounded out the dents in the kettles.
sentences.chinese: 伊利莎走出大門，看他將鍋上的凹痕敲平。

sentences.english: And I can beat the dents out of little pots.
sentences.chinese: 而且我也能弄平小鍋上的凹痕。

sentences.english: A level bite is not a fault. Pitted teeth from distemper or allied infections are not penalized.
sentences.chinese: 由於犬瘟熱或其他疾病造成的牙齒凹痕不屬於缺陷。

sentences.english: Check each body panel and the roof, looking for scratches, dents, and rust.
sentences.chinese: 檢查車身的每塊嵌板和車頂，尋找擦傷，凹痕和鏽。

sentences.english: The hail was so big it made dents in people's cars and cracked windshields.
sentences.chinese: 大塊冰雹在人們的車上砸出了凹痕，砸裂了擋風玻璃。

sentences.english: Hammered out the dents in the fender; hammered out a contract acceptable to both sides.
sentences.chinese: 我父親看到汽車擋泥板上的凹痕時，他一定會發怒的。

sentences.english: The dent on the wing of our car can be beaten out at the garage.
sentences.chinese: 我們汽車擋泥板上的凹痕可以在汽車修理廠敲平。

definition: trace/impression (e.g. footprint)/abbr. of 印子錢|印子钱[yin4 zi5 qian2], usury
